thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: InvincIble Iron Man #4 Marvel Preview
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: InvincIble Iron Man #4 Marvel Preview

author: Matthew Mueller
title: EXCLUSIVE: InvincIble Iron Man #4 Marvel Preview
text:
EXCLUSIVE: InvincIble Iron Man #4 Marvel Preview Matthew Mueller Start Photo Gallery Back to Article Image of 
It's been quite the adjustment period for RiRi Williams, especially now that her mentor is always around courtesy of his knowledgeable but annoying artificial intelligence. 
In ComicBook.com's exclusive preview of Invincible Iron Man #4 , RiRi gets to fight alongside another member of the Iron Man family, Pepper Potts. It's a memorable experience to be sure, but she probably envisioned it a bit differently. 
Invincible Iron Man is written by Brian Michael Bendis with art by Stefano Caselli. The coloring is by Marte Gracia with lettering by VC's Clayton Cowles. You can find the description below and the preview in the gallery. 
With every issue Riri discovers more about what being a hero really means in this modern complicated world. Her actions start to have a powerful effect across the world and the question is, is Riri ready to take on that responsibility? All this plus, Not only did Tony Stark leave a laundry list of things that need taking care of, he left a laundry list of criminals looking to destroy his legacy. 
Invincible Iron Man #4 is in comic shops February 15.
